message.body: Is your house still for sale and does it have A yard?
I haven't put it up for sale yet but I will. It has a nice fenced in yard with a garden but not as big as yours
I'm asking for boss. I'll keep an eye out for yr listing on the interwebs. Thanks!
I'm not going to list it til I have an agreement on another property. But if your boss wants to see it, put her in contact with me
